Club Homes Pasadena Yacht And Country Club homes for sale in Gulfport include some of the most luxurious homes on the Gulf coast of Florida. The single-family homes in the Pasadena Yacht & Country Club Communities include Skimmer Point, Kipps Colony Estates, Fairway Bay, and Pasadena Point Estates. Many of the homes provide waterfront amenities and beautiful water views. Enjoy the security of a gated community and optional access to amazing amenities at the Yacht & Country Club. The homes range in size from 3 bedroom 2 baths with about 2,000 sq ft to 5 bedroom 5 bath homes with 5,000 sq ft or more of living area. Read More Below... Interested in a home in Gulfport Florida? There are 376 single-family homes in the PYCC communities. Most were built between 1980 and 2004 but many of the homes have done upgrades since then. Links to the Listings 1. Skimmer Point 2. Kipps Colony Estates 3. Pasadena Point Estates 4. Fairway Bay More Information About Pasadena Yacht And Country Club Homes About the Pasadena Yacht and Country Club and Its Amenities Pasadena Yacht and Country Club is located minutes from the Gulf Beaches and downtown St Petersburg with a history dating back to 1924. With nearly 300 acres of sub-tropical landscaping, residents and members enjoy a sense of community in an exclusive, luxurious environment. The golf course lies adjacent to Boca Ciega Bay, bathed by refreshing bay breezes and stunning sunsets. Pasadena Yacht and Country Club is a private club with traditional values and first-class amenities including golf, a health club, a Jr. Olympic swimming pool, 82 boat slip marina, tennis courts, and three dining areas. Adult and Junior golf, swim & tennis programs are offered year-round. A la carte dining is offered at the Country Club, as well as Champagne Sunday brunches and Holiday brunch celebrations, a Ladies Luncheon and Fashion Show, and music each Friday evening. Other social events include book clubs, weekly Bridge, wine society, chefs table, date night with kid care, poolside movie theater, and private trips to broadway shows in Tampa. A number of upgrades were made in 2017 to the clubhouse and golf course making Pasadena Yacht & Country Club one of the premier private clubs in Pinellas County. Location The Pasadena Yacht & Country Club Communities are located in the southwest section of Gulfport Florida on the shores of Boca Ciega Bay. The entrance is at the intersection of Gulfport Blvd South, and Pasadena Point Blvd South. What's Nearby Gulfport's numerous local and unique restaurants are just two miles away lining Shore Blvd South and Beach Blvd South. Lifestyle Enjoy a country club atmosphere, with elegant dining, a championship golf course, a private marina, and swim and tennis for the whole family. Why People Live in PYCC Beautiful waterfront and golf course homes in a secure gated community with unparalleled amenities and easy access to Gulfport and the pristine waters of Boca Ciega Bay and the Gulf of Mexico. Interested in a home or condo in Pasadena Yacht And Country Club? We are here to help. Give us a call at 727-619-2799 or use our handy contact form below.
